data.name: A HERO AND A GARDEN Original Soundtrack and Remix
data.detailed_description:
Original soundtrack and remix for the gardening visual novel and clicker game A HERO AND A GARDEN.

Play as a fairytale hero and help him garden, since saving the princess didn't go that well.
